patthana18.9:1.1_0: Hetuṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:1.1_1: Nahetuṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:1.1_2: Hetuṁ saraṇañca nahetuṁ saraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:1.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.9:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:2.1_1: Nahetuṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:2.1_2: Nahetuṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu naaraṇo ca nanahetu naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
